name: Slime Fall (Backbox Publisher)
description:
Slime Fall is a 2d Falling platform with 5 levels that can be challenging! You play as a green slime which must consume red slimes to retain his slimy being enough to make it to the finish flag! Unfortunately, your favorite crown was taken so you must fight the Queen Slime to get it back! I plan on adding much more levels and content to the game and maybe even an iOS version! Please consider donating at least a small amount! It really helps us out and we really need the money to make more than just one small game!

Version 1.0

Version 1.1 - current
